message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fairer split. Let's settle this quickly.
Come on, I'm being generous here
This is getting us nowhere. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
I'll give you a little more, but I'm not going to 50/50
Okay, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise slightly, but I need a larger share to account for the decreasing value.
You're running out of time, take this deal before it's too late
Alice, we're running out of time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.  Let's not throw away all the money.
